description: This is Susan Sontag's documentary about Israel, shot during the Yom Kippur war. Much of it is strictly observational.
name: Promised Lands

review.name: Interesting Window into Israel during this time.
review.reviewBody: I think the reviewer above is bringing too much of his own garbage to his review. This innocent crudely edited movie has tremendous historical value. The movie was made my an American film maker. It only made about $1,000. How could it be propaganda? One of the unidentified interviewees summed it quite well. For Israelis the 73 war and the Arab's threat to drive Israelis into the sea was Auschwitz all over again.
